description: A job list shall be defined as a collection of job orders for a specific period of time and selected work centers or other resources
title: Job list
$comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

links.dtdl:description: The job orders contained by this job list.

links.x-jsonschema:$comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.

hierarchyScope.title: Hierarchy scope
hierarchyScope.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy. Optionally, hierarchy scope defines the scope of the equipment class, such as the site or area where it is defined.

oneOf.$comment: can be used when the activity contains several categories

startTime.title: Start Time
startTime.description: The starting time for the associated job list.

endTime.title: End Time
endTime.description: The ending time for the associated job list.

publishedDate.title: Published Date
publishedDate.description: The date and time on which the work master or work directive was published or generated
